nodes.text: Captured is a young readers book based on "The Gungan General," an episode from the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series.

Not only have Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi been captured by space pirates, but their archenemy, Count Dooku, has been captured as well. Now this unlikely team must work together to escape from their captors, before their differences get the better of them.
